item.description:
Join NHCers on a Holiday Bar Crawl!  SantaCon happens yearly in many cities around the globe.  Basically people put on holiday costumes and stop around at local bars at a designated route, spreading holiday cheer in a positive (if a bit stumbly) way.

Many dress as Santa and address each other as such.  Parade around New Haven with a group of fellow Santas.  All that's required is that you dress in holiday fashion (perhaps as a reindeer or snowman or tree or Dickens' character) and spread good cheer.

The event itself will visit other locations too and starts earlier, feel free to hit up the other stops before this Meetup.

FIND US: If you want to know where the crawl is, you can text me, or follow the crawl's Twitter feeds, http://twitter.com/KrystalKringle &  http://twitter.com/NHSantacon If you have a "regular" phone (non-smartphone), you can still follow the feeds, and "turn on mobile notifications", then the updates will be texted to your phone.

DANCING: If any SantaConners (whether part of the Meetup or not) continue to hang-out Saturday, I will definitely stay out late enough to go dancing at the clubs.

For more info on SantaCon and it's many locations visit: http://santacon.info/About.html

For more info on the New Haven SantaCon specificallly, visit: https://sites.google.com/site/newhavensantacon/

HOST: Jason.  My # is in my RSVP
item.how_to_find_us: Text me. My # is in my RSVP. I'm tall (6'3") & I'll be dressed as an elf, in red & green, with tights
item.name: Sat. 12/15 - SantaCon - New Haven
